data.actual_result: The messages are visible as though the user is not blocked.
data.expected_result: The messages are hidden behind a "We've hidden these results because the user is blocked" message.
data.short_description: Search results for blocked users show the actual message content, not a Blocked Messages bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server you mutually share with a user you blocked. - Search for posts by that user. - Observe the search results.
